title: The Fundamentals of Production Planning and Control.pdf
description:
The Fundamentals of Production Planning and Control by Stephen N. Chapman

Paperback: 288 pages
Publisher: Prentice Hall (March 11, 2005)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 013017615X
ISBN-13: 978-0130176158

This focused book concentrates on planning and control; it answers the question: â€œwhat parts of operations management do we really need to know?â€ It does not bog the reader down with details, but allows them to concentrate on fundamental principles, such as the development and application of software solutions, inventory management, and lean production concepts. Topics include: forecasting, sales and operations, scheduling, materials requirements, capacity management, production control, â€œpartneringâ€ activities, and system integration. An excellent handbook for operations managers, production control workers, inventory control employees, and those involved in supply chain, logistics, and materials management
